import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const Edit = () => { const auth = useSelector(state => state.auth); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: auth.user.email, characterType: auth.user.characterTyep, currentList : auth.user.currentList }); console.log('auth') console.log(auth.user) return (

Account

) } export default Edit;
